The GOAT of tactical first-person shooters. Easy to understand, but takes a lifetime to master. Precise gunplay, movement and tactics available in Valve's Source Engine make it an evergreen product that fosters a thriving scene almost a decade since its release.

after 1000 hours of playing, i've come to realise that, although it is extremely frustrating at times, and no matter how calm you are, you will tilt, this game is really beautiful. it takes you in, and rewards your grinding and hard work in-game, and will show you results. would i recommend this game to someone who just wants to game casually for a few hours? i wouldn't. CS:GO is a game that requires hours and hours of your life, only to begin understanding and getting good at the game. I have only scratched the surface after 1000 hours, and still have a very long way to go. Here's to 1000 more!
